creator: GCosta Apps
descriptionHtml:
Learn any subject and get ready for tests and exams with Revise!

Revise helps you in your studies through Smart Review of question and answer cards (flashcards). Just create the flashcards as you are studying and when you are about to forget what you have learned we will let you know to review it, so that your learning will never be forgotten.

★ Main features:
• Organize your studies with colors and tags for better grouping of content
• Use Smart Review and never forget what you've learned
• Create any flashcards with text or images from camera and gallery
• Make custom exams according to your studies and tags and get detailed statistics of your learning
• Learn new study techniques for more effective learning
• Study day or night with night mode
• Want more comfort to create your cards? Use Review on the Web
descriptionShort: Get ready for tests and exams with flashcards and Smart Reviews

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Now the cards for review and exam are shuffled. We also show the number of days for the next review for each option selected when answering the card.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
The most requested feature has arrived!

It is now possible to import studies made by other users and share yours with friends! Now it's even easier to learn!
